#define PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_CONCEPTS   0
#define PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_DATA   1

Functions

PIZError pizGaloisLatticeEncodeToArray (const PIZGaloisLattice *x, long n, PIZGrowingArray *a)

Define Documentation

#define PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_CONCEPTS   0

Index of number of concepts in pizGaloisLatticeEncodeToArray().

#define PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_DATA   1

Index of data in pizGaloisLatticeEncodeToArray().

Function Documentation

PIZError pizGaloisLatticeEncodeToArray ( const PIZGaloisLattice *  x,
long  n,
PIZGrowingArray *  a 
)

Encode all the concepts with a given size to a dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
n The size of the concepts.
a A pointer to a dynamic array.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
An example : 
 long             err = PIZ_GOOD;
 long             n = 4;
 PIZGrowingArray  *a = pizGrowingArrayNew (16);

 err = pizGaloisLatticeEncodeToArray (lattice, n, a);

 if (!err)
      {
          long i;
          long count = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_CONCEPTS);
          long *ptr  = pizGrowingArrayPtr (a);
          long *values = NULL;

          for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                  values = ptr + PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_DATA + (n * i);
              }
      }

  pizGrowingArrayFree (a);
